flawed_nl_solution:
The truck driver can go 3 * 12 = <<3*12=36>>36 miles on the gas in his tank.
He needs to go 90 - 36 = <<90-36=45>>45 more miles.
Thus, the truck driver needs to put 45 / 3 = <<45/3=15>>15 more gallons of gas in his semi.
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 54, not 45. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
